text: 3 years and younger    Standard treatment of nonmedulloblastoma embryonal tumors in children aged 3 years and younger is:         - Surgery to remove as much of the tumor as possible, followed by chemotherapy.        Other treatments that may be given after surgery include the following:         - Chemotherapy and radiation therapy to the area where the tumor was removed.    -  High-dose chemotherapy with stem cell rescue.
